title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\NodeNetworkConfig
name: NodeNetworkConfig
description:
Parameters for node pool-level network config.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.NodeNetworkConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.create_pod_range
params.description: Input only. Whether to create a new range for pod IPs in this node pool. Defaults are provided for pod_range and pod_ipv4_cidr_block if they are not specified. If neither create_pod_range or pod_range are specified, the cluster-level default (ip_allocation_policy.cluster_ipv4_cidr_block) is used. Only applicable if ip_allocation_policy.use_ip_aliases is true. This field cannot be changed after the node pool has been created.

params.name: data.pod_range
params.description: The ID of the secondary range for pod IPs. If create_pod_range is true, this ID is used for the new range. If create_pod_range is false, uses an existing secondary range with this ID. Only applicable if ip_allocation_policy.use_ip_aliases is true. This field cannot be changed after the node pool has been created.

params.name: data.pod_ipv4_cidr_block
params.description: The IP address range for pod IPs in this node pool. Only applicable if create_pod_range is true. Set to blank to have a range chosen with the default size. Set to /netmask (e.g. /14) to have a range chosen with a specific netmask. Set to a CIDR notation (e.g. 10.96.0.0/14) to pick a specific range to use. Only applicable if ip_allocation_policy.use_ip_aliases is true. This field cannot be changed after the node pool has been created.

methods.name: getCreatePodRange
methods.description:
Input only. Whether to create a new range for pod IPs in this node pool.

Defaults are provided for pod_range and pod_ipv4_cidr_block if they are not specified. If neither create_pod_range or pod_range are specified, the cluster-level default (ip_allocation_policy.cluster_ipv4_cidr_block) is used. Only applicable if ip_allocation_policy.use_ip_aliases is true. This field cannot be changed after the node pool has been created.
